ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. John D. Truscott ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. JOHN D. TRUSCOTT, a Judge of the Supreme Court of British Columbia, commencing on the date of the Order in Council.
AttachmentsAttachment
